"Explore more interesting games? track your daily steps? we are here with you~"
Are you sure you wish to reset the game?

In this game, user needs to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create a tile with the number 2048. Every turn, a new tile with a value 2 or 4 will randomly appear on the board. Tiles will move toward the users\' chosen direction, and two tiles of the same number will collide while moving, they will merge into a tile with the total value of the two tiles that collided.
See how many maths questions you can answer within 60s. Check for the video tutorial: Calculation game guide Video
Challenge your memory by finding as many similar cards as you can within 60s. Check the Game tutorial: Image game guide Video

Dementia describes a collection of symptoms caused by disorders affecting the brain which affects thinking, behaviour and the ability to perform everyday tasks. Brain function is affected enough to interfere with the person’s normal social or working life.

Most people with dementia are older and it is more common after the age of 65 years. People in their 40s and 50s can also have dementia. As per ABS, the deaths due to Dementia increase every day in Australia.

The early signs of dementia are very subtle and vague and may not be immediately obvious. Some common symptoms may include: • Progressive and frequent memory loss • Confusion • Personality change • Apathy and withdrawal • Loss of ability to perform everyday tasks.
What can be done to help?

At present there is no prevention or cure for most forms of dementia. However, some medications have been found to reduce some symptoms. Support from Family and Friends is vital for people with dementia.
Want to know more! \n Check it out Dementia.org.au!!
The total cases in Australia for 2020
Would you like to know about Dementia?
In this game, add the 2s to get 2048 by moving the tiles across. Check out the Video tutorial:2048 guide Video
